column2: data_set <-gapminder %>% group_by(country) %>% summarize(Continent = continent[year==1952], LifeExp=mean(lifeExp), Pop=mean(pop), GDP=mean(gdpPercap)) %>% filter(country %in% c("Canada","Australia","Argentina","Japan","India","China","New Zealand","United States")) %>% select(country,Continent,GDP) %>% arrange(Continent)
